name: application-state
description: What is Application State? --- * [ ] Build a Movie Search App with Vanilla JS   * [x] Get movie search term from user   * [x] fetch API with search term   * [x] Add search results to page   * [x] Click result to add to "watch later" list   * [ ] Indicate results that are already in "watch later" list (do later...) * [x] What _is_ state? * [x] Refactor app to use single state object * [x] Refactor app to use a render/view function * [ ] Re-write app with Vue.js
